attributes.action: remove the unpleasant structure from the fourth plinth in Trafalgar Square and replace it with a statue of William Wilberforce
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would be a fitting way to commemorate the 200th anniversary of the abolition of slavery - and at the same time remove that hideous eyesore from Trafalgar square.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
